授業目的: The main purpose of all my literature courses is to enable students to familiarize authentic literary texts in English. For this purpose, interesting fantasy stories written for juvenile readers are selected, so that you can read a whole book enjoyably without so much difficulties. This course (and the course D2), focuses primarily on substantial reading. You will read a longer book (400 pages or more) and discuss the story extensively with other students. In short, the course will provide you with a lot of interesting reading and discussing opportunities.
到達目標:
1. You will be able to read a whole fantasy book written for juvenile readers and understand the benefits of reading it.
2. You will be able to exchange their thoughts and insights that they obtain from reading with other students.
3. You will be able to express their thoughts and interpretation of the story in a presentation and essays.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
- For the students permitted to take classes online: You will participate in within-class zoom sessions.
- Reading, students' presentations, and discussions will be main activities of the course.

評価.教科書Required texts0: Northern Lights or The Subtle Knife by Phillip Pullman, or The Hobbit by J.R.R. Tolkien is planned as a course book. More specific information will be provided by the first week. You are required to obtain a legitimate copy of the assigned course book, either paper or electric version, by the second week.
